name: mdast
description: Speedy Markdown parser for multipurpose analysis
author: Christopher Jeffrey

scripts.test-travis: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports test/index.js
scripts.lint-style: node_modules/.bin/jscs index.js lib/parse/index.js lib/stringify/index.js test/index.js test/fixtures.js benchmark.js --reporter=inline
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-test && npm run lint-benchmark && npm run lint-style
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run coverage
